name: reldmoprab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0

stmt.origin: a1ii(wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))), diffss(s0, s1))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
-| wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
-| wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))

cumulated.origin:

comment: The domain of an operation class abstraction is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-1995.)
